en.title: Opening of Change Today Institute International, Manila!

table.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; text-align: justify; background-color: rgb(238, 240, 252);

td.strong: REPORT BY CROWN PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTOR BENJAMIN CUARESMA.

tr.td:
The vision of a group of powerful and giving leaders of FusionExcel International became a reality! The office of CHANGE TODAY INSTITUTE INTERNATIONAL (CTII) Manila was finally opened for training of FusionExcel's global leaders and entrepreneurs.
The ribbon-cutting ceremony was led by Crown Presidential Director Benjamin Cuaresma and his lovely and passionate wife Crown Presidential Director Gloria Cuaresma. Presidential Director Rudolf and Mai Cruz, Val Domingo and Max Salazar and other ambassadors of Change Today were also present to grace the occasion. Mr. Benjamin Cuaresma led the prayer dedication of the office to our God Almighty.
The ceremony was attended by different power Leaders and Presidential Directors of the group. We were all inspired by the speech given by Benjamin Cuaresma on how the tried and tested system for network building will be rolled out to the Leaders. It is the goal of our ambassadors of Change Today to create millionaires in our group.
A speech on the glimpse of the first step in LIFE Workshop was given by Max Salazar. He left our hearts on fire as he touches on creating our dreams to become a reality.
With the opening of CTII Manila office, we expect better changes in lives and new FusionExcel millionaires to happen!
Change Today provides a proven and borderless network marketing training system seamlessly woven with transformational and developmental coaching to increase the global sustainability and creative advantage of every network marketing entrepreneur.
At Change Today, we happily support our FusionExcel partners in achieving and celebrating success and abundance in every aspect of their lives!
